TextView.android:text: Summary: Word Wizard is a Scrabble Practice app, players can focus on making words out of a rack and board. To begin click PLay Game.

A Player starts the game with a pool of letters to draw from, and a certain number of turns. When the game begins 7 letters will be drawn from the pool and placed in the rack and four will be drawn and placed in the board. A player can then make a turn.
On a players turn a player can:

A player can make a word using any number of rack letters and one board letter.The game will then check that the word is valid and has not been used before. If the word is valid, the points of the letters used to make it will be accumulated toward the player's score. The one letter used from the rack will be swapped with the letter used from the board. The rest will be discarded and replenished with letters from the pool. If the word is not valid, it will be rejected at no penatly to the player. They will simply have to pick a new word.
The player can swap any amount of letters in their rack with random letters from the pool. This will cost the player one turn.
1) A player runs out of turns
Depleting the rack will net the player an additional 10 bonus points.
